extendedInfo.description: The release and continuation of Atom Launcherâs Theme Market â the new Atom Store 2.0!Beginning now you can download themes created through collaboration with famous writers and amazing themes straight from stars of the âKorean Waveâ.â¶ One day of paid themes for free!âTodayâs freeâ service has now been newly opened. This is a golden opportunity for everyone to try out for free some of our amazing paid themes. Every day you can check out the Atom Store and be greeted by new themes, keeping things fresh and interesting on your home page. (After checking: âSettings â Security â Unknown Sourcesâ, Todayâs Free themes should be downloadable, however, it is impossible to re-download the theme if you remove it.)â¶ Search and Categories A new search function as well as categories have been added so you can more easily find the themes you are interested in.â¶ Theme Exhibitions and Hot Themes Donât worry anymore about the large amount of choices and variety on Atom. To make it easier to search for and find high quality themes you might be interested in, we have introduced new exhibitions, season theming, trends, etc... Also, take a look at the new âHot Themesâ section which regularly features popular themes.***How to use the Atom Store 1.Search for Atom Store on Google Play or Touch â Click the home screen on your atom launcher and select Atom Store; move to the download page (will be automatically connected to the Atom Store immediately after installation)2.Download Atom Store and Install it3.Download themes you are interested in*** Whatâs in the Atom Store1. Atom ThemesThemes designed exclusively for the Atom Launcher. You can change not only wallpapers but also icons and folders simultaneously. 2. Lock Screen We offer cool lock screens for Atom and many other launchers. You can easily set the lock screen with our lock screen manager. 3. Atom Icon PackIcons only for the Atom Launcher*** Attention- Available for Android OS version 4.0.2 and up- By checking, âSettings â Security â Unknown Sourcesâ Todayâs Free-of-charge service can be used- The theme application needs 10 MB in total of space to save theme resources- To enhance usability, the installed theme doesn't appear- Themes for Tab devices (X-large screen) will be available soon*** Customer SupportPlease leave reviews or comments via the Google play reviews sectionYour review is greatly appreciated. For more information or support, please visit Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/atom.themes
